verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: With one exception] , [ARG0: Oklahoma ’s congressional delegation] [V: disagreed] [ARG2: with President Trump ’s decision to levy tariffs on longtime allies in North America and Europe] .
With one exception , Oklahoma ’s congressional delegation disagreed with President Trump ’s decision to [V: levy] [ARG1: tariffs on longtime allies in North America and Europe] .
